Hello, We're A Traveling Family.

We want to have the adventure of a lifetime. Follow an idea to the edges. And keep going. Forgo tradition. Trust OUR instincts. Be who we are. And let our natural creativity & curiosity be our guide.

We are Full-Time Vagabonders

Traveling makes us realize how much we donâ€™t know about the world It shows us what we're capable of. Traveling restores our faith in humanity It reminds us that we all have the same basic needs. Traveling shows us that there are other ways to do things It introduces us to like-minded people and to realize that our goals and dreams are not uncommon.

In 2013, we ventured out into the USA as a family - in a 15ft vintage 1981 Trillium travel trailer in tow - for an Unmistakable adventure. We've been traveling ever since, and the so the adventure continues.

We're Educators Of Young Minds

Using today's most conscious education curriculum and methods available, Mom helps us make our biggest contribution to humanity yet - home schooling our ten going on twenty year old daughter.
